name: jsziptools
description: It's a utility of zlib, gzip and zip format binary data.

scripts.build:release: tsc && browserify browserify/browser.js --no-builtins --dg=false -p licensify -g uglifyify -o dist/jsziptools.js
scripts.build:test: tsc && browserify browserify/test.js --no-builtins --dg=false -o dist/test.js && browserify browserify/test_worker.js --no-builtins --dg=false -o dist/test_worker.js
scripts.release: npm run build:test && npm test -- ci && npm run build:release

author: Syu Kato
